extendedInfo.description: The premier Super Nintendo emulator! Developed from the ground up to deliver the fastest play possible. Easily locate and play your favorite titles by scanning your phone, viewing your list of installed ROMs complete with cover art. Save your progress at any time and return instantly to where you left off, thanks to a quick save state system. A huge database of Game Genieâ¢ and Pro Action Replayâ¢ codes rounds off the package to deliver the ultimate SNES emulation experience.â¢ Fastest emulation, best game compatibilityâ¢ Ultra-fast SuperFX core support for playing StarFox & Yoshi's Islandâ¢ SA1 chip support for Mario RPG, Kirby, and moreâ¢ Dropbox cloud syncing support for continuous play across devices.â¢ Network multiplayer using WiFi or Bluetoothâ¢ Visual effects! (OpenGL ES Shaders) Support for custom shaders!â¢ Slick user interfaceâ¢ On-screen multitouch controls with optional rumble feedbackâ¢ Advanced layout editor for on-screen controlsâ¢ Custom screen size and orientationâ¢ Auto-detects games and displays cover artâ¢ Custom control mappingâ¢ Support for Moga/Pro, Zeemote and iCade 8-bitty game controllersâ¢ Save games with screen shotâ¢ Thousands of cheats (Pro Action Replayâ¢, Game Genieâ¢)â¢ In-game GameFAQsâ¢ integrationâ¢ Fast-forward games using turbo skipâ¢ Support for SMC, FIG, SFC, ZIP, and 7z formatsâ¢ Helpful and responsive customer serviceSee FAQ or Game Compatibility List at SuperGNES.com.** Actual SNES emulation developers. SuperGNES is regularly updated and supported. **We support the preservation of classic gaming through our corporate sponsorship of the Digital Game Museum. Check them out at www.digitalgamemuseum.org and keep retro alive!LEGAL: Super Nintendo game software sold separately. SuperGNES emulator (âSuperGNESâ) users must obtain self-created and privately used backup copies of rightfully owned physical video game cartridges for use with the SuperGNES. Any such copies used with the SuperGNES must comply with permitted personal copies made in accordance with 17 U.S.C. Â§ 117(a)(1). Any video game software copies made for use with or by the SuperGNES shall not be distributed to others, online or otherwise. This product is not affiliated with, nor authorized, endorsed or licensed in any way by Nintendo Company, Ltd., its affiliates or subsidiaries. âSuper Nintendoâ and âNintendoâ are registered trademarks of Nintendo of America, Inc. Any and all video game software screen shots and related images that are simulated by the SuperGNES and available on this SuperGNES Google Play listing, the SuperGNES website (www.supergnes.com), SuperGNES software user interface or any SuperGNES promotional material (collectively âEmulated Contentâ) is property of their respective copyright owners. Bubble Zap Gamesâ use of any Emulated Content is only for the purpose of providing comparative advertising to inform customers of the SuperGNESâ abilities and functionality in a truthful and non-deceptive manner.

reviews.title: Best snes app available
reviews.comment: This is hands down the best snes app period.. Smooth controls.. Near perfect emulation.. And great customization.. Thanks for the great app! Definitely worth the money!
reviews.author: James Romer

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: This emulator is beautiful, rubs smooth, downloads cover at, organized list and easy navigation along with Bluetooth compatibility and key mapping, keep on keepin on!
reviews.author: Daniel Stoyles

reviews.title: Love it...
reviews.comment: Brings back a lot of memories. It\'s easy and very well made. Hard to get use to, but over all, it\'s fun to play.
reviews.author: jose rosas

reviews.title: Best emulator on the market
reviews.comment: As others have mentioned, slight compatability issues, similar to PC emulators. Haven\'t rooted my phone, so I\'m not sure if a bluetooth controller will work.  Just bought the Moga Pro blue tooth controller, hope it works flawlessly on my Android 2.3.6.
reviews.author: Joe Barrett

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Best SNES app out there, large game selection, great support, constantly updated. Highly recommend playing on a keyboard if you are considering to run this and play on a tablet device.
reviews.author: Craig Bryant

reviews.title: Fantastic app
reviews.comment: Great app and love the coverage function. The input menu has always been a bit buggy but manageable. Now if this app were to add chrome cast support I would be in heaven.
reviews.author: Michael Quinn

reviews.title: Hands down the best
reviews.comment: Smooth SNES emulator, plays 98% of games without a problem and with the ability to use your own cover art? Perfect.
reviews.author: John Comeau

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: The controls were a little hard at first on a galaxy tab but after I figured out how to resize them to em smaller it works perfect.  Love it
reviews.author: Jeremy Habetler

reviews.title: Dope app
reviews.comment: I\'m so glad i can play all my favorite super nes games anytime. Best app ever
reviews.author: Isaac Wade

reviews.title: Amazing Emulator!!
reviews.comment: Downloaded it and was playing Super Mario world and Super Street Fighter 2 but wasn\'t liking the responsiveness. I attached my PS3 controller and now enjoying those titles plus Mario kart, chrono tigger, and LoZ:LttP!! Thank you for this!! (LoZ is my all time fav SNES game)
reviews.author: Manuel Sandoval

reviews.title: Excellent emulator!
reviews.comment: I like this emu cause it has good frame rate
reviews.author: Danny Delver

reviews.title: Pure Greatness
reviews.comment: Greatest emulator I\'ve played, so many games frm my childhood that I get to play n introduce to my nieces n nephews...Greatness
reviews.author: Chris Williams

reviews.title: Brilliant stuff!
reviews.comment: Plays all my SNES ROMs brilliantly, no probs so far, hope you guys keep on refining and improving this app. Also love the fact its got action replay and game genie codes installed too, great stuff, keep up the good work!
reviews.author: RICHARD EASTWOOD

reviews.title: Best emulator
reviews.comment: This is the best emulator I have used on Android.  The ability to save games is worth the price too.   The only thing is I got sick in chrono trigger because I couldn\'t hold R and L while entering the key command for a part in the game.
reviews.author: john capilos

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Works really well. Zelda rain sound is perfect. Other emu not so much. Hope that u can add option to change screen size manually, scaled is the only one any good, but would like it to be a little bit smaller
reviews.author: Adrian Walker

reviews.title: Greatest Emulator In Play Store
reviews.comment: This right here is the best emulator I use in the play store but what would make it better if we can use our own cover art for the rom. Other then that great job keep up the good work dev
reviews.author: Justin Hudson

reviews.title: Best emulator I\'ve ever used
reviews.comment: I have used a lot of emulators in my day. And this one runs smoother than any I\'ve ever used. All of my ROMs run on it!
reviews.author: Rob Menke

reviews.title: Full 5 Stars
reviews.comment: Amazing app bringing the 90\'s back to life.
reviews.author: ryan stewart

reviews.title: When games were games
reviews.comment: Sorry I\'ve sorted my problem out McAfee was stopping me from using your site. Great app tho non rooted Xperia Z and this works beyond great.
reviews.author: Gaz Jackson

reviews.title: Wow huge improvement
reviews.comment: The developer had made huge strides on this emulator. This little things make it great. The adjustable interface is great. The toichable buttons have gotten smoother. On my note 2 I can place the controls on the side and it is almost like having a device with physical butttons. This is the snes emulator to get.
reviews.author: A Google User
